metadata.title: CVE-2022-28287 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In unusual circumstances, selecting text could cause text selection cachingto behave incorrectly, leading to a crash. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 99.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28287` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
firefox-geckodriver - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2').
